REST API v3

  • Reference
  • Guides
  • Libraries

Available Endpoints

GitHub Apps are available on GitHub Enterprise as an early access technical preview. If you experience any issues, please contact GitHub Enterprise support.

Note: To access the API with your integration, you must provide a custom media type in the Accept Header for your requests.

application/vnd.github.machine-man-preview+json

The following endpoints are available for use by GitHub Apps. For more information, see "GitHub Apps."

You must use an installation access token to access these endpoints.

Teams

  • List teams
  • Get team
  • Create team
  • Edit team
  • Delete team
  • List child teams
  • List team repos
  • Check if a team manages a repository

    Organizations

    • List all organizations
    • List user organizations
    • Get an organization

      Reactions

      • List reactions for a commit comment
      • List reactions for an issue
      • List reactions for an issue comment
      • List reactions for a pull request review comment

        Emojis

        • Emojis

          Gitignore

          • Listing available templates
          • Get a single template

            Members

            • Members list

            • Remove a member
            • Public members list
            • Check public membership
            • Get organization membership
            • Add or update organization membership
            • Remove organization membership

              Outside Collaborators

              • List outside collaborators
              • Remove outside collaborator
              • Convert member to outside collaborator

                • List repository projects
